column4: my sound card can play music but have some unpleasant ZiZi sound
no it work well under window 2k

i had unpleasant sounds before, and i played around with the settings in the mixer. It turned out that one of the amps didn't like it when they were maxed out. I found that around 70% of max amplification made the unpleasant sounds disappear, and i still could get a high volume out of my speakers
i'd recommend you to turn down pcm to around 70% and use Master to control your volume
then it can't be the same problem i had. :/
is there a list to show supported sound card in ubuntu?
i mean good support, not this quality
what player do you use to play your music files?
have you checked if you use alsa as your output?
i try to use alsa but met some problem
